author: potuz
content: The fact is that today we have pools delaying over a second block production. So if that's profitable I take it as a sign that we have leeway still. Reorgs exist because of timing games between these players are always testing the limits of what's the latest you can submit your block. I'm not sure if ePBS can handle 12 seconds per slot, but I wouldn't bet against it just yet.
